description: This file defines a Next.js page component for a blog post, including static data for posts, functions to generate static parameters and metadata, and rendering logic for displaying a blog post based on URL parameters.

methods.name: generateStaticParams
methods.description: Generates static parameters for pre-rendering all blog post slugs.

methods.name: generateMetadata
methods.description: Creates metadata (title, description, canonical URL) for a given blog post based on URL parameters.

methods.name: BlogPost
methods.description: React component that renders a blog post based on URL parameters, or triggers a notFound() if the post does not exist.
